EndingCards.Title: Frogman, The Forgotten
EndingCards.Card: Frogman promptly left after the final battle. He returned to his old town and was never heard from again.

EndingCards.Title: Frogman, Dark Overlord
EndingCards.Card: Frogman joined forces with Torment in their conquest of humanity, and ruled over the conquered with an iron fist.

EndingCards.Title: Firbell, Lost Princess
EndingCards.Card: Firbell searched far and wide for her beloved Irenhold. She eventually lost touch with the world, and slowly wasted away.

EndingCards.Title: Kresla, Revived Legend
EndingCards.Card: She brought her discoveries back to Bromzing, and lead the new research on Torment's magic, to disastrous results.

EndingCards.Title: Xirveros, Forever Mad
EndingCards.Card: Torment took over Xirveros' mind and turned him into their new champion. He terrorised humanity with mad glee.

EndingCards.Title: Xeplogi, Failed Duke
EndingCards.Card: Xeplogi returned to his homeland and tried to warn the populace of Torment's return. Nobody listened.

EndingCards.Title: Memerian, Lone Hermit
EndingCards.Card: Memerian left shortly after the battle, never to be seen again. She lived the rest of her life in a secluded forest.

EndingCards.Title: Alfred, The Avenger
EndingCards.Card: Alfred finally fulfilled his dying wish - destroying the Guards. Soon after, he joined the fight against Torment.

EndingCards.Title: Fashima, Doombringer
EndingCards.Card: Torment kept Fashima chained, powerless and in eternal pain, forcing her to watch as humanity burned around her.

EndingCards.Title: Werse, The Last Magus
EndingCards.Card: Werse managed to rescue a few Guards from the Fortress. They founded a safe haven for survivors, far from Torment.

EndingCards.Title: Torment, Revived God
EndingCards.Card: Torment immediately set out to take over humanity again, using their endless power and unlimited monster hordes.
